entry.title: There by The River, Our Hearts Shall Wade and Wither.
entry.summary:
Author: callhimnow

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,027Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 13

Summary: Distraught after the loss of his mother, and consumed by the dread of a brewing war, the young prince of Beacon struggles to find his footing. Alongside his father the king, his friends, and the insufferable young knight of a neighboring fallen kingdom, they resist the vengeful Peter and his army. Alternatively:The self-indulgent Royalty AU literally no one asked for.

entry.title: Shattered and Bound
entry.summary:
Author: DaisyBeats

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,939Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 567

Summary: After losing Derek and his father to a feral Scott in the aftermath of the Nogitsune, a shattered Stiles kills his former best friend and is left drowning in guilt and grief.Unable to live in a world where everyone he loves is gone, he casts a one way time travel spell meant to rewrite it all - only to wake up years earlier than expected, in a peaceful dimension where he never existed and the Hales are still alive.Haunted by trauma and drawn to a younger, unbroken Derek, Stiles must navigate healing, fate, and love in a world that was never meant to be his.

entry.title: And Then There Was You
entry.summary:
Author: DaisyBeats

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 49,373Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 1,280

Summary: “I’m having a baby,” Derek said simply.Stiles stared. “What?”“I’m having a baby,” he repeated, quieter this time. “Well, not me, obviously. A girl I… met. After Laura died.”Stiles blinked. “Wait - what girl?”~~~~~Derek finds out he's going to be a father and turns to the Stilinski's for help. (Starts during Season 2 of the show)

entry.title: Sometimes, the end can be the beginning
entry.summary:
Author: dreamygirl06

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,945Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 11

Summary: Something broke inside Liam. The fear, the helplessness, all the walls he had carefully built around his feelings for months shattered under the weight of an overwhelming truth: he was about to lose him, and he had never said the most important thing. Despair flooded him, powerful and terrifying. He grabbed Theo's shoulders, shaking him with a fury born of love and fear."THEO RAEKEN!"he screamed, his voice echoing off the clinic walls, raw and torn open. "FIGHT!" The tears he had been holding back finally burst forth, a hot torrent falling onto Theo's still face. "FIGHT BECAUSE I LOVE YOU, DAMN IT! I'VE LOVED YOU ALL THIS TIME AND I WAS TOO SCARED TO EVER SAY IT! YOU CAN'T DIE WITHOUT KNOWING IT! DO YOU HEAR ME? I LOVE YOU! NOW COME BACK!" His shout was a final testament, a naked, bleeding heart offered on the altar of loss. Exhausted, he collapsed onto Theo's chest, his body wracked with desolate sobs. The world shrank to that sound, to the coldness of Theo's skin, and the monotonous beep of the machine. And then…

entry.title: A Spark of Change
entry.summary:
Author: RaatKiRani

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 126,741Chapters: 25/?Kudos: 694

Summary: “This isn’t what it looks like, “ Fuck, that’s what we’re going with?“What…does it look like?” asks Boyd slowly.“I don’t even know, but it won’t be that.” I can’t afford to move from where I’m trying to hold Derek to this life with t-shirts and sheer spite. “Um…help?”“I’ll call an ambulance.” Boyd reaches for his phone. Isaac is still frozen just past the threshold, silent, like he’s trying not to be noticed.“NO!” I shriek, and like a fucking flash grenade in my panic, I light up blazing silver. Hoh, boy, I’ve gone and done it now. “…Yeah, no, can’t do that.”“W-what…are you?” Lord, that question has gotten a lot less funny.“An environmentalist, apparently. Look, just- please, help me?” I’m solidly crying now. “I’ll tell you anything you want after.”Isaac speaks for the first time. “A-are we hiding a body?”I snort a bit hysterically. “Yeah, no, the bare minimum to unlock that level of friendship is 6 months or a trauma bond.”“I’m qualified then,” Isaac deadpans, because he is a fucking menace like that. “What do you need?”XXXXXXXXXXXLayla, a blind, brown, badass ready to do whatever to protect her friends. The supernaturals make it very hard.

entry.title: Pure Madness
entry.summary:
Author: Hamahthesith

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,147Chapters: 6/20Kudos: 7

Summary: Stiles could still remember the first time his mother explained the importance of epigenetic memory. In spite of the trauma associated with such genetic continuity, she stressed the importance of remembrance in all of its various forms. He hadn't truly understood until a madness claimed Beacon Hills as it's home. Only he has the genetic continuity, the memories, to free the minds of their hometown. With the occasional assistance of an overbearing sour wolf, oh, and his pack of wolves.

entry.title: Inciting Spark
entry.summary:
Author: LLN3dseestheLight

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,885Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 18

Summary: After Tobia Budge attacked Hannibal Lecter, Will Graham gets a phone call, his friend, John Stiliski, is dead, and his son, Stiles Stilinski, is in a coma. Will goes to Beacon Hills to Stiles. Emerging from a three-week coma, Stiles was told that his father, John Stilinski, had died in the accident that led to his coma, and that he had to find himself back in 2013. But that wasn't his most significant issue. No, it was the fact that in this reality, Will Graham was his biological father. Someone Stiles, only known as a TV show character!
